abstract: Banks’ lending numbers suggest that while the economy remains extremely fragile, the confidence of consumers and businesses may be more resilient than many experts had believed.
snippet: Banks’ lending numbers suggest that while the economy remains extremely fragile, the confidence of consumers and businesses may be more resilient than many experts had believed.
lead_paragraph: Despite all the bleak economic news, a funny thing has been happening in the financial industry over the last few months: the banks have quietly turned on the lending spigot.

headline.main: Banks Start to Make More Loans

byline.original: By Eric Dash and Ben Protess
